page.title: 18Events in W.Itchenor
page.content: The{Itchenor Sailing Club}organises annually open meetings for its classes - Swallows, Sunbeams, X-ODs, 14ft Internationals, Fireballs, Fireflies, and Lasers and regular racing for these classes every weekend. It also organises a {Junior Fortnight for 8-18 year olds during the week before and week of Cowes Week, sailing Ducklings, Mirrors, Toppers and Fireflies, all owned by the individual cadet members. An exhibition, arranged by local women, of marine and flower paintings by professional and amateur painters, with pottery and craft, is given every two years in aid of the Mission to Seamen in Itchenor Memorial Hall. The tenth was held in 1985.
